dashboard.label: EDR Process Explorer
dashboard.description: Process execution information from EDR agents

search.query: | inputlookup edr_agents | stats count by tenant | sort tenant
| inputlookup edr_agents | stats count by os_platform | sort os_platform
| inputlookup edr_agents | search $os_platform_token$ $hostname_token$ | head $limit_token$ | stats count as "Agent Count"

| inputlookup edr_agents | search $os_platform_token$ $hostname_token$ | head $limit_token$ | edrhunt provider=$provider_param$ tenant=$tenant_param$ data_type=processes time_range=$time_range_param$ query=$query_param$ threads=$threads_param$ include_raw=false debug=false | stats sum(edr_process_count) as "Total Processes" dc(edr_hostname) as "Hosts with Matches"

| inputlookup edr_agents | search $os_platform_token$ $hostname_token$ | head $limit_token$ | edrhunt provider=$provider_param$ tenant=$tenant_param$ data_type=processes time_range=$time_range_param$ query=$query_param$ threads=$threads_param$ include_raw=false debug=false | search edr_process_match=true | mvexpand edr_process_names | stats count by edr_process_names | sort -count | head 10

| inputlookup edr_agents | search $os_platform_token$ $hostname_token$ | head $limit_token$ | edrhunt provider=$provider_param$ tenant=$tenant_param$ data_type=processes time_range=$time_range_param$ query=$query_param$ threads=$threads_param$ include_raw=false debug=false | search edr_process_match=true | mvexpand edr_command_lines | table edr_hostname edr_command_lines edr_timestamp | rename edr_hostname as "Hostname" edr_command_lines as "Command Line" edr_timestamp as "Timestamp"

| inputlookup edr_agents | search $os_platform_token$ $hostname_token$ | head $limit_token$ | edrhunt provider=$provider_param$ tenant=$tenant_param$ data_type=processes time_range=$time_range_param$ query=$query_param$ threads=$threads_param$ include_raw=false debug=false | eval timestamp=coalesce(edr_timestamp, _time) | eval category="Process" | eval title=mvindex(edr_process_names, 0) | eval description=mvindex(edr_command_lines, 0) | eval host=edr_hostname | table timestamp category title description host

| inputlookup edr_agents | search $os_platform_token$ $hostname_token$ | head $limit_token$ | edrhunt provider=$provider_param$ tenant=$tenant_param$ data_type=processes time_range=$time_range_param$ query=$query_param$ threads=$threads_param$ include_raw=false debug=false | eval has_match = edr_process_match=true | where has_match="true" | stats count by edr_hostname | sort -count | head 20
